casper
Class Tool

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--casper.Tool
public class Tool
extends java.lang.Object

道具类,包括加血,加技能值的.


Example:

int[][] subImage;
int[] idSubImage;
Image img;

int x,y;
int width,height;

int function;

Product p;

Tool t =new Tool(img, subImage, x, y, width, height, function, p);

t.setPos(x,y);

t.setProduct(p);
Author: wangquan
Version: 1.0

Field Summary
Method Summary
void setPos(int x,int y) 设置物品的位置.
void setProduct(Product p) 设置有效反映的物体.
void setShow(int Show) 设置打开物品功能开关,0 打开 1 关闭.
boolean isCollidingWithProduct() 是否碰撞物体.
void paint(Graphics g) 绘制道具.
void drawSubImage(Graphics g,int x,int y) 裁减绘制.
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
